body_html:
Thank you very much. It works.

On Mon, Jun 20, 2016 at 10:04 PM, Derek Murray notifications@github.com
wrote:

activate is typically only used if you install TensorFlow in a
virtualenv. Since you don't appear to have done this, you should be able to
use TensorFlow straight away, e.g. by running python and typing import
tensorflow as tf at the prompt.

—
You are receiving this because you authored the thread.

wrote:

> tensorflow as tf at the prompt.
